sentences.en: Abstention from drinking and smoking is the only way to improve your poor health.
sentences.cn: 戒掉烟酒是改变你不良健康状况的唯一途径.

sentences.en: Abstention is traditionally high in Colombia.
sentences.cn: 在哥伦比亚，弃权率历来较高。

sentences.en: An abstention is not regarded as a veto.
By abstention from incontinence, energy is acquired.
sentences.cn: 依欲念的归顺(不纵情)而获得精力(灵性能力)的增长.

sentences.en: Given the abstention rate of 40 percent, his actual support could be far lower.
sentences.cn: 如果有40%的弃权率, 那他的实际拥护者将会远远降低.

sentences.en: In Washington the Bureau of European Affairs recommended abstention.
sentences.cn: 在华盛顿,欧洲事务司主张弃权.

sentences.en: Scowcroft met with Dinitz to brief him on the Soviet proposal for a joint abstention.
sentences.cn: 斯考克罗夫特会见迪尼茨,向上通报苏联关于联合弃权的建议.

sentences.en: The application of judicial abstention principle in the estimation on the conditions of safeguard measures.
sentences.cn: 司法节制原则在保障措施实施要件认定中的运用.

sentences.en: The draft law was passed by 134 votes to 19, with 5 abstentions.
sentences.cn: 该法律草案以134票对19票获得通过，另有5票弃权。

sentences.en: The goal is complete abstention from all mind-altering substances.
sentences.cn: 目标是彻底戒绝所有致幻物质。

sentences.en: The motion is carried by 200 votes to 150, with 60 abstention.
sentences.cn: 以200票对150票通过此项动议, 但有60票弃权.

sentences.en: The Security Council voted with 3 pros, 1 cons and I abstention.
sentences.cn: 安理会投票,3票赞成, 1票反对,1票弃权.

sentences.en: There were high levels of abstention in the election.
sentences.cn: 那次选举中有许多人弃权.

sentences.en: When abstention from avarice is perfected, there comes an understanding of the law of rebirth.
sentences.cn: 当贪妄消除而趋于完美时, 生命的悟性将得以再生.

sentences.en: When abstention from theft is perfected, the yogi can have whatever he desires.
sentences.cn: 当偷窃的观念消除而趋于完美时, 修持者将获得满足.

sentences.en: Yama is abstention from harming others , from false - hood , from theft , from incontinence, and from greed.
sentences.cn: 不杀生、不说谎 、 不偷盗 、 不纵欲、不贪婪.

trans.tran_en: an act of not voting for or against something
